00032 namespace {
00033   const char end_row_chars[3] = { (char)0xff, (char)0xff, 0 };
00034   const char end_root_row_chars[5] = { '0', ':', (char)0xff, (char)0xff, 0 };
00035 
00036   size_t
00037   write_key(uint8_t *buf, uint8_t control, uint8_t flag, const char *row,
00038             uint8_t column_family_code, const char *column_qualifier) {
00039     uint8_t *ptr = buf;
00040     *ptr++ = control;
00041     strcpy((char *)ptr, row);
00042     ptr += strlen(row) + 1;
00043     *ptr++ = column_family_code;
00044     if (column_qualifier != 0) {
00045       strcpy((char *)ptr, column_qualifier);
00046       ptr += strlen(column_qualifier) + 1;
00047     }
00048     else
00049       *ptr++ = 0;
00050     *ptr++ = flag;
00051     return ptr-buf;
00052   }
00053 }

00056 namespace Hypertable {

00058   const char *Key::END_ROW_MARKER = (const char *)end_row_chars;
00059   const char *Key::END_ROOT_ROW   = (const char *)end_root_row_chars;

00061   ByteString
00062   create_key(uint8_t flag, const char *row, uint8_t column_family_code,
00063       const char *column_qualifier, int64_t timestamp, int64_t revision) {
00064     size_t len = 1 + strlen(row) + 4;
00065     uint8_t control = 0;
00066 
00067     if (timestamp == AUTO_ASSIGN)
00068       control = Key::AUTO_TIMESTAMP;
00069     else if (timestamp != TIMESTAMP_NULL) {
00070       len += 8;
00071       control = Key::HAVE_TIMESTAMP;
00072     }
00073 
00074     if (revision != AUTO_ASSIGN) {
00075       len += 8;
00076       control |= Key::HAVE_REVISION;
00077     }
00078 
00079     uint8_t *ptr = new uint8_t [len + Serialization::encoded_length_vi32(len)];
00080         // !!! could probably just make this 6
00081     ByteString bs(ptr);
00082     Serialization::encode_vi32(&ptr, len);
00083     ptr += write_key(ptr, control, flag, row, column_family_code,
00084                      column_qualifier);
00085 
00086     if (control & Key::HAVE_TIMESTAMP)
00087       Key::encode_ts64(&ptr, timestamp);
00088 
00089     if (control & Key::HAVE_REVISION)
00090       Key::encode_ts64(&ptr, revision);
00091 
00092     return bs;
00093   }

00095   void
00096   create_key_and_append(DynamicBuffer &dst_buf, uint8_t flag, const char *row,
00097       uint8_t column_family_code, const char *column_qualifier,
00098       int64_t timestamp, int64_t revision) {
00099     size_t len = 1 + strlen(row) + 4;
00100     uint8_t control = 0;
00101 
00102     if (column_qualifier)
00103       len += strlen(column_qualifier);
00104 
00105     if (timestamp == AUTO_ASSIGN)
00106       control = Key::AUTO_TIMESTAMP;
00107     else if (timestamp != TIMESTAMP_NULL) {
00108       len += 8;
00109       control = Key::HAVE_TIMESTAMP;
00110       if (timestamp == revision)
00111         control |= Key::REV_IS_TS;
00112     }
00113 
00114     if (revision != AUTO_ASSIGN) {
00115       if (!(control & Key::REV_IS_TS))
00116         len += 8;
00117       control |= Key::HAVE_REVISION;
00118     }
00119 
00120     if (dst_buf.remaining() < len + 6)
00121       dst_buf.grow(dst_buf.fill() + len + 6);
00122     Serialization::encode_vi32(&dst_buf.ptr, len);
00123     dst_buf.ptr += write_key(dst_buf.ptr, control, flag, row,
00124                              column_family_code, column_qualifier);
00125 
00126     if (control & Key::HAVE_TIMESTAMP)
00127       Key::encode_ts64(&dst_buf.ptr, timestamp);
00128 
00129     if ((control & Key::HAVE_REVISION)
00130         && !(control & Key::REV_IS_TS))
00131       Key::encode_ts64(&dst_buf.ptr, revision);
00132 
00133     assert(dst_buf.fill() <= dst_buf.size);
00134 
00135   }
00136 
00137   void create_key_and_append(DynamicBuffer &dst_buf, const char *row) {
00138     uint8_t control = Key::HAVE_REVISION
00139         | Key::HAVE_TIMESTAMP | Key::REV_IS_TS;
00140     size_t len = 13 + strlen(row);
00141     if (dst_buf.remaining() < len + 6)
00142       dst_buf.grow(dst_buf.fill() + len + 6);
00143     Serialization::encode_vi32(&dst_buf.ptr, len);
00144     dst_buf.ptr += write_key(dst_buf.ptr, control, 0, row, 0, 0);
00145     Key::encode_ts64(&dst_buf.ptr, 0);
00146     assert(dst_buf.fill() <= dst_buf.size);
00147   }
00148 
00149   Key::Key(SerializedKey key) {
00150     HT_EXPECT(load(key), Error::BAD_KEY);
00151   }
00152 
00156   bool Key::load(SerializedKey key) {
00157     serial = key;
00158 
00159     size_t len = Serialization::decode_vi32(&key.ptr);
00160 
00161     length = len + (key.ptr - serial.ptr);
00162 
00163     const uint8_t *end_ptr = key.ptr + len;
00164 
00165     control = *key.ptr++;
00166     row = (const char *)key.ptr;
00167 
00168     while (key.ptr < end_ptr && *key.ptr != 0)
00169       key.ptr++;
00170 
00171     row_len = key.ptr - (uint8_t *)row;
00172     assert(strlen(row) == row_len);
00173     key.ptr++;
00174 
00175     if (key.ptr >= end_ptr) {
00176       cerr << "row decode overrun" << endl;
00177       return false;
00178     }
00179 
00180     column_family_code = *key.ptr++;
00181     column_qualifier = (const char *)key.ptr;
00182 
00183     while (key.ptr < end_ptr && *key.ptr != 0)
00184       key.ptr++;
00185 
00186     column_qualifier_len = key.ptr - (uint8_t *)column_qualifier;
00187     assert(strlen(column_qualifier) == column_qualifier_len);
00188     key.ptr++;
00189 
00190     if (key.ptr >= end_ptr) {
00191       cerr << "qualifier decode overrun" << endl;
00192       return false;
00193     }
00194 
00195     flag_ptr = key.ptr;
00196     flag = *key.ptr++;
00197 
00198     if (control & HAVE_TIMESTAMP) {
00199       timestamp = decode_ts64((const uint8_t **)&key.ptr);
00200       if (control & REV_IS_TS) {
00201         revision = timestamp;
00202         assert(key.ptr == end_ptr);
00203         return true;
00204       }
00205     }
00206     else {
00207       if (control & AUTO_TIMESTAMP)
00208         timestamp = AUTO_ASSIGN;
00209       else
00210         timestamp = TIMESTAMP_NULL;
00211     }
00212 
00213     if (control & HAVE_REVISION)
00214       revision = decode_ts64((const uint8_t **)&key.ptr);
00215     else
00216       revision = AUTO_ASSIGN;
00217 
00218     assert(key.ptr == end_ptr);
00219 
00220     return true;
00221   }

00224   std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, const Key &key) {
00225     bool got = false;
00226     os << "control=(";
00227     if (key.control & Key::HAVE_REVISION) {
00228       os << "REV";
00229       got = true;
00230     }
00231     if (key.control & Key::HAVE_TIMESTAMP) {
00232       os << ((got) ? "|TS" : "TS");
00233       got = true;
00234     }
00235     if (key.control & Key::AUTO_TIMESTAMP) {
00236       os << ((got) ? "|AUTO" : "AUTO");
00237       got = true;
00238     }
00239     if (key.control & Key::REV_IS_TS) {
00240       os << ((got) ? "|SHARED" : "SHARED");
00241       got = true;
00242     }
00243     os << ") row='" << key.row << "' ";
00244     if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW)
00245       os << "ts=" << key.timestamp << " rev=" << key.revision << " DELETE_ROW";
00246     else {
00247       os << "family=" << (int)key.column_family_code;
00248       if (key.column_qualifier)
00249         os << " qualifier='" << key.column_qualifier << "'";
00250       os << " ts=" << key.timestamp;
00251       os << " rev=" << key.revision;
00252       if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_CELL)
00253         os << " DELETE_CELL";
00254       else if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_COLUMN_FAMILY)
00255         os << " DELETE_COLUMN_FAMILY";
00256     }
00257     return os;
00258   }
